CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Borealis Graduate School relative to Arcane University?
SRP.A: Borealis Graduate School is {above} Arcane University in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Meridian Academy relative to Arcane University?
SRP.A: Meridian Academy is {below} Arcane University in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Meridian Academy relative to Borealis Graduate School?
SRP.A: Meridian Academy is {below} Borealis Graduate School in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total graduation rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Zenith Institute of Technology}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total graduation rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Arcane University}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Silverhaven Polytechnic's minimum Graduation Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Silverhaven Polytechnic's minimum Graduation Rate is in {1976}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Meridian Academy's maximum Graduation Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Meridian Academy's maximum Graduation Rate is in {1982}.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1985, was the average total Graduation Rate higher or lower than between 1979 and 1981?
NC.A: The average total graduation rate between 1978 and 1985 was {higher} than between 1979 and 1981.

NC.Q: Was the total Graduation Rate in 1978 higher or lower than in 1979?
NC.A: The total graduation rate in 1978 was {higher} than in 1979.

NC.Q: Was the total Graduation Rate in 1980 higher or lower than in 1986?
NC.A: The total graduation rate in 1980 was {lower} than in 1986.

NC.Q: Between 1976 and 1982, did the total Graduation Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1978 and 1984?
NC.A: The change in total graduation rate between 1976 and 1982 was {smaller} than between 1978 and 1984.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Silverhaven Polytechnic} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Aethelgard School of Arts and Silverhaven Polytechnic first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Aethelgard School of Arts and Silverhaven Polytechnic first exchanged leading positions in {1977}.
